mission: Family Guy style animated news. Professional news overlay graphics. Iran International logo top-right. News anchor Maryam (Persian Lois Griffin with hijab, huge eyes) reports: 'BREAKING NEWS: Scientists confirm water has officially ghosted Iran. It left no forwarding address.' Show cartoon map of Iran with water droplets running away with suitcases. News ticker: 'WATER CRISIS DAY 1,847'. Peter Griffin-style official: 'Water? Never heard of her.' Citizens licking morning dew. Lower third: 'EXCLUSIVE: Dew Licking Tutorial at 11'

output.optimized_script: BREAKING NEWS: Scientists confirm water has officially ghosted Iran. It left no forwarding address. Our ticker shows the Water Crisis is now on day 1,847. This is a severe situation for the entire nation. When asked about the missing water, one official stated, 'Water? Never heard of her.' This is truly baffling. Desperate citizens are now resorting to licking morning dew for survival. This is the harsh reality they face daily. Stay with us for an exclusive tutorial on effective dew licking techniques at eleven. You will not want to miss this

visual_style.reasoning: The request explicitly asks for 'Family Guy style animated news' and features cartoon characters. The visual descriptions like 'huge eyes,' 'suitcases,' and 'licking morning dew' all lean heavily into a cartoon aesthetic. A vibrant color palette will enhance the comedic and exaggerated nature of the Family Guy style.
